-- | findM and other missing 'M's
--   
--   findM and other missing <a>M</a>s
@package MissingM
@version 0.0.4

module Control.Monad.MissingM
findM :: Monad m => (a -> m Bool) -> [a] -> m (Maybe a)
findMapM :: Monad m => (a -> m (Maybe b)) -> [a] -> m (Maybe b)
